examples.example: 我买了一千克新鲜的水果，准备和家人一起分享。

translate.english: I bought one kilogram of fresh fruits and am going to share them with my family.

examples.example: 我扛着一千克的大米，开心地走在回家的路上。

translate.english: I am carrying one kilogram of rice and walking happily on the way home.

examples.example: 我今天去市场买了一千克美味的肉，准备做一顿丰盛的晚餐。

translate.english: I went to the market today and bought one kilogram of delicious meat, preparing to make a sumptuous dinner.
